mapper.select: select comments_no, comments_content, comments_date, comments_show, comments_fname, comments_fsize, users_nickname FROM comments, board, users WHERE board.board_no = comments.board_no and comments.board_no = #{board_no} and comments.users_no = users.users_no ORDER BY comments_no
mapper.insert: insert into comments(comments_no, board_no, users_no, comments_content, comments_date, comments_fname, comments_fsize, comments_show) values(seq_comments.nextval, #{board_no}, #{users_no},#{comments_content}, sysdate, #{comments_fname},#{comments_fsize}, 0)
mapper.update: update comments set b_step = b_step +1 where b_ref=#{b_ref} and b_step > #{b_step}
UPDATE comments SET comments_show = 1 WHERE comments_no = #{comments_no}
mapper.select: select comments_no, users_nickname, comments_content, comments_date, comments_fname, comments_fsize from comments, users where comments_no=#{comments_no} and comments.users_no = comments.users_no
